page.title: 10Victoria Turner's day
page.content: I{go to bed}at{9}0'clock.I{get up}at{7 o'clock so I have{10}hours sleep.When I get up I get dressed quickly and make my bed.I make a{cup of tea}for my family.Then I go into the bathroom to {wash}and to{brush}my hair.For {breakfast}I have a{piece of toast}with {Bovril}on it. I say goodbye to my family,walk up to {Capton Cross}and wait for the bus.The {bus}takes us to the{Normandy Arms}in Blackawton and I walk through the village and the churchyard.I wait in the{playground}until the{bell}rings. We have only{two teachers}in our school.After doing{Maths and English } we have our{dinner}and then go back into school until 3.20 p.m.I go home again on the bus and play with my brother and sister.On{Friday evening}I go to{youth club}until{10 p.m.}
